## â“ Technical Q&A

### Getting Started with Development

**Title:** ğŸ› ï¸ Getting Started with FormerlyIncarcerated.org Development

**Content:**
New to contributing to our platform? Start here! 

**Development Setup:**
1. Fork the repository
2. Clone locally: `git clone https://github.com/your-username/formerlyincarcerated.git`
3. Install dependencies: `bun install`
4. Set up environment: `cp .env.example .env.local`
5. Start development: `bun dev`

**Tech Stack:**
- âš›ï¸ **Frontend:** Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript
- ğŸ¨ **Styling:** Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components
- ğŸ” **Web3:** Wagmi, Viem, WalletConnect
- ğŸ—„ï¸ **Backend:** Supabase, PostgreSQL
- â›“ï¸ **Blockchain:** Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base

**Common Questions:**
- How do I set up my development environment?
- What are the coding standards and best practices?
- How do I contribute to Web3 features?
- Where can I find the API documentation?

**Getting Help:**
- ğŸ’¬ Ask questions in this category
- ğŸ“š Check our [documentation](https://docs.formerlyincarcerated.org)

### Community Governance Introduction

**Title:** ğŸ›ï¸ Introduction to Community Governance - Your Voice Matters

**Content:**
Welcome to our community governance space! This is where we make decisions together about the future of FormerlyIncarcerated.org.

**What is community governance?**
Our platform is designed to be community-controlled, meaning that the people who use it have a say in how it develops and operates.

**How governance works:**
1. ğŸ’¡ **Proposals:** Community members suggest changes or new initiatives
2. ğŸ—£ï¸ **Discussion:** We discuss the pros, cons, and alternatives
3. ğŸ—³ï¸ **Voting:** Token holders vote on proposals
4. âœ… **Implementation:** Approved proposals are implemented
5. ğŸ“Š **Review:** We evaluate the results and learn

**Types of decisions we make together:**
- ğŸ¯ Platform feature priorities
- ğŸ’° Community funding allocation
- ğŸ“œ Policy and guideline updates
- ğŸ¤ Partnership approvals
- ğŸ”§ Technical architecture decisions

**Who can participate?**
- ğŸ« **Token holders:** Vote on proposals
- ğŸ‘¥ **Community members:** Suggest ideas and participate in discussions
- ğŸ› ï¸ **Contributors:** Help implement approved proposals

**Governance principles:**
- ğŸ¤ **Inclusive:** Everyone's voice matters
- ğŸ” **Transparent:** Open discussion and clear processes
- ğŸ“Š **Data-driven:** Decisions based on evidence and community needs
- âš¡ **Responsive:** Quick action on urgent issues
- ğŸ¯ **Mission-focused:** Always serving our core purpose

Ready to help shape our future? Start by participating in discussions and sharing your perspectives!
